amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to ensuring that medical facilities of the Department of Veterans Affairs meet the privacy, dignity, and safety needs of women veterans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 456 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 456 proposed by Senator Heller. (consideration: CR S1875-1877; text: CR S1876) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to ensuring that medical facilities of the Department of Veterans Affairs meet the privacy, dignity, and safety needs of women veterans.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 456 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 456 proposed by Senator Heller.
